name: Tic-Tac-Toe (using C)
description:
This is an old tic-tac-toe game I made a long time ago when I was still in 9th grade using C and the Allegro 4 library (now that's an old one). Unfortunatly it's only in portuguese (pt-pt), but it's easy to understand since there are only 5 words in it. You can also press F1 for an About window and F2 and/or F3 to change colors. In case you're wondering why it's called "jogo do galo" that's what we call the tic-tac-toe game in Portugal.

The source code might not have everything, I think it's missing the .h file that's included in main.c.

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9sN1EdZZQZ1jmh1I6S3lJA
